messages.content: Sam Collins lives in Sheerness, she says: "I just want to make a difference for my family and community. This is my home, my partner was born on the Island and my children will grow up here."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sam Collins supports taking action on the climate emergency.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An Economy that Works for All
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Aims for an economy that is inclusive and works for everyone.
#DECENTHOMES indicates support for secure and affordable housing for everyone.
Advocates for improved and environmentally friendly transport options.
Prioritizes the availability of free and high-quality education.
Stresses the importance of protecting the National Health Service.
Calls for measures to enhance animal welfare.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The conservatives have failed Sittingbourne & Sheppey.

issues.economy: An Economy that Works for All

leaflet.personalStatement: I look forward to the challenges ahead. The Green Party is the way forward, now the mainstream parties continuously let us down. I am campaigning for social justice and to protect our planet from climate change.

quotes.text: Unlike other parties, the Green Party does not accept funding from big business, the finance sector or trade unions. We do this so that we can stay independent from these agendas and act in the best interests of our community.

images.caption: SAM COLLINS from the Green Party on an election campaign leaflet with a list of key priorities and personal statements emphasizing community-oriented values and environmental concerns.

leaflet.additionalNotes: THE 12TH DECEMBER WE HAVE THE CHANCE TO CHANGE THE FUTURE OF THIS COUNTRY TOGETHER! - All across England and Wales, people will be voting for a greener, more equal society for everyone and we need your help to make this happen. After months of uncertainty, this is the time to Vote Green, so that we can take urgent action on the climate emergency and deliver a Green New Deal which will create a greener, fairer Britain for all.
